summary.description:
Experience expansive living at Purva Park Hill.
Set across 15 acres of lush greenery off Kanakapura Road, this thoughtfully planned community offers spacious 3 BHK residences with large balconies, 80% open spaces, and 40+ curated amenities designed for holistic living. With seamless connectivity to NICE Road and JP Nagar Metro, Purva Park Hill places South Bengaluru?s leading schools, cultural hubs, and business districts within easy reach.

A home where space, serenity, and convenience come together?so everyday living feels truly elevated.
highlights: Spacious 3 BHK Tri-Deck homes with seamless indoor?outdoor living
Expansive balconies & well-planned layouts that maximise space and light
Grand clubhouse & large swimming pool for elevated leisure
1 km dedicated jogging track set amidst landscaped greens
Yoga & wellness zones for everyday rejuvenation
Squash court & curated sports amenities for active lifestyles
Lush open spaces across a serene community

aboutBuilder.name: purva

meta.title: About the Developer
meta.subtitle: A trusted name with a proven track record in delivering quality homes
meta.tagline: Built on credibility. Known for consistency.

aboutBuilder.description: Puravankara Limited, headquartered in Bengaluru, is one of India?s most admired and trusted home builders and is recognized among the top real estate companies in India, with a legacy of excellence spanning over 50 years. Founded in 1975, the company is known for delivering high-quality homes on time with complete transparency.
aboutBuilder.descriptionExpanded: Puravankara has launched three prominent brands, each catering to distinct market segments. Puravankara itself is recognized for its luxurious, state-of-the-art projects that incorporate innovative technology to redefine future homes. Provident Housing Ltd., a wholly-owned subsidiary launched in 2008, addresses the needs of mid-income homeowners. Purva Land, established in 2021, offers a lucrative investment opportunity through plotted developments, responding to the evolving needs of homebuyers. Additionally, Starworth Infrastructure and Construction Limited (SICL) provides technology-enabled construction solutions. Puravankara also has a strong presence in commercial office spaces.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.subtitle: Everything you need to know before making a decision

faqs.title: Where is Purva Park Hill located?
items: Purva Park Hill is located off Kanakapura Road in South Bangalore, close to NICE Road and JP Nagar Metro, offering excellent connectivity to key residential, educational, and commercial hubs.

faqs.title: What type of homes are available at Purva Park Hill?
items: Purva Park Hill offers spacious 3 BHK luxury apartments, including distinctive Tri-Deck homes designed for expansive, comfortable living.

faqs.title: How large is the project and what is the land area?
items: The project is spread across approximately 15 acres, with nearly 80% open spaces, landscaped greens, and thoughtfully planned community areas.

faqs.title: How many towers and floors does Purva Park Hill have?
items: Purva Park Hill comprises 4 residential towers, each rising G + 20 floors, offering a balanced high-rise community with ample open views.

faqs.title: What makes Purva Park Hill unique among apartments on Kanakapura Road?
items: Key highlights include Tri-Deck homes, large balconies, a 1 km jogging track, expansive open spaces, and lifestyle amenities designed for wellness, leisure, and family living.

faqs.title: Who is the developer of Purva Park Hill?
items: Purva Park Hill is developed by Puravankara Limited, a reputed real estate brand with over five decades of experience in premium residential development.

faqs.title: Is Purva Park Hill suitable for professionals working in South Bangalore?
items: Yes. Its proximity to NICE Road and Metro connectivity makes it ideal for professionals working in JP Nagar, Jayanagar, Bannerghatta Road, and other parts of South Bangalore.

faqs.title: What amenities are available at Purva Park Hill?
items: Residents enjoy 40+ lifestyle amenities including a grand clubhouse, large swimming pool, 1 km jogging track, yoga zones, squash court, sports facilities, and landscaped open spaces.

faqs.title: What is the price range of apartments at Purva Park Hill?
items: Luxury 3 BHK apartments at Purva Park Hill are priced from ?2.02 Cr onwards*, depending on configuration, floor level, and unit specifications.

faqs.title: Is Purva Park Hill a good option for long-term investment?
items: Yes. Strong fundamentals include its large land parcel, improving Kanakapura Road infrastructure, proximity to Metro and NICE Road, and strong brand backing.

faqs.title: Does Purva Park Hill offer good rental potential?
items: Yes. Spacious 3 BHK homes in gated communities along Kanakapura Road attract families and professionals seeking long-term rentals, supporting stable rental demand.

faqs.title: Is Purva Park Hill RERA approved?
items: Yes. Purva Park Hill is RERA registered, ensuring transparency, regulatory compliance, and buyer protection as per applicable norms.

faqs.title: Are these homes suitable for end users or investors?
items: Both. End users benefit from space, open environments, and lifestyle amenities, while investors gain from infrastructure-led appreciation and steady rental prospects.

faqs.title: How can I book a site visit or get detailed pricing?
items: You can request a guided site visit, receive the latest pricing and availability, and get unbiased assistance through PropYouLike.
